name: Code Tool
semantic_context: Write a tool in JS or Python
natural_language_description: 这是 Code Tool 节点。主要用于: Write a tool in JS or Python

notice.displayName: All properties will be required. To make them optional, use the 'JSON Schema' schema type instead
notice.name: notice
notice.natural_language_description: 参数名: All properties will be required. To make them optional, use the 'JSON Schema' schema type instead

noticeTemplateExample.displayName: See an example of a conversational agent with custom tool written in JavaScript here.
noticeTemplateExample.name: noticeTemplateExample
noticeTemplateExample.natural_language_description: 参数名: See an example of a conversational agent with custom tool written in JavaScript here.

name.name: name
name.description: The name of the function to be called, could contain letters, numbers, and underscores only
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: The name of the function to be called, could contain letters, numbers, and underscores only

language.name: language
language.natural_language_description: 参数名: Language | 默认值: javaScript

jsCode.name: jsCode
jsCode.default:
// Example: convert the incoming query to uppercase and return it
return query.toUpperCase()
jsCode.description: E.g. Converts any text to uppercase
jsCode.natural_language_description:
参数名: JavaScript | 作用: E.g. Converts any text to uppercase | 提示: You can access the input the tool receives via the input property "query". The returned value should be a single string. | 默认值: // Example: convert the incoming query to uppercase and return it
return query.toUpperCase()

pythonCode.name: pythonCode
pythonCode.default:
# Example: convert the incoming query to uppercase and return it
return _query.upper()
pythonCode.description: E.g. Converts any text to uppercase
pythonCode.natural_language_description:
参数名: Python | 作用: E.g. Converts any text to uppercase | 提示: You can access the input the tool receives via the input property "_query". The returned value should be a single string. | 默认值: # Example: convert the incoming query to uppercase and return it
return _query.upper()

specifyInputSchema.name: specifyInputSchema
specifyInputSchema.description: Whether to specify the schema for the function. This would require the LLM to provide the input in the correct format and would validate it against the schema.
specifyInputSchema.natural_language_description: 参数名: Specify Input Schema | 作用: Whether to specify the schema for the function. This would require the LLM to provide the input in the correct format and would validate it against the schema. | 默认值: False

schemaType.name: schemaType
schemaType.description: How to specify the schema for the function
schemaType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Schema Type | 作用: How to specify the schema for the function | 默认值: fromJson
available_options: Generate From JSON Example (值: fromJson) - Generate a schema from an example JSON object
Define using JSON Schema (值: manual) - Define the JSON schema manually

jsonSchemaExample.name: jsonSchemaExample
jsonSchemaExample.description: Example JSON object to use to generate the schema

inputSchema.name: inputSchema
inputSchema.description: Schema to use for the function
